tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
title_narrative: UNMAS Technical assistance to the Colombian mine action sector and Demining in Leiva, Nariño
Assistenza tecnica al settore dello sminamento umanitario in Colombia e operazioni di bonifica a Leiva, Nariño
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: The project objective is to release land contaminated by or suspected to be contaminated by landmines or UXOs in Leiva, Nariño to communities for productive use and ensure the Colombian mine action sector has the capacity to implement the National Mine Action Strategic Plan 2016-21 and deliver its planned contribution to implementation of the peace accord between the Government and FARC-EP, and any future accord with the ELN.

Sostegno alla riduzione del rischio derivante dalla presenza di mine antiuomo nelle aree contaminate della regione del Nariño, municipio di Leiva, attraverso interventi di sminamento e attività di mine risk education.
